Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.streams.char2char

This package contains a set of output streams, that get character content and convert it to another appropriative character content. All the classes in the packages are children of the Reader or Writer and can be used in all cases when the ones is used.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PreprocessingReader.ErrorProcessingCallback
    This interface describes callback to process #error and #warning message for PreprocessingReader class
    PreprocessingReader.IncludeCallback
    This functional interface describes callback to process include statements for PreprocessingReader class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreoleWriter
    This class converts CREOLE 1.0 content to the predefined content (see MarkupOutputFormat description).
    PreprocessingReader
    This class implements preprocessing for the reader nested.
    PrintStreamWrapper
    This class is a wrapper to PrintStream class.
    PrintWriterWrapper
    This class is a wrapper to PrintStream class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CreoleWriter.CreoleLexema  
    PreprocessingReader.HidingMethod
    This enumeration describes method to process content need be excluded from the input stream for PreprocessingReader class
